item.description:
Ok, it's Halloween and Metro Rock will have it's usual costume contest. Last year the fake blood was very scary - in a rock climbing setting. After climbing we will go discover the haunted lands around Davis Sq. and beyond. I'll let you know more exactly as we get closer to the day.

If you are new to Metro Rock you will need a belay test (or class) so call them for the details... (or you can just boulder.)

I will be near the water fountains at 7PM.

Geoff (617) 501-6217

PS Me and Steph are also working on a mad scientist house for the next day (Saturday) so keep your ears to the ground.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing money and worthless stocks
item.name: Spooky Rock Climbing at Metro Rock.
